name: 2sp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w0)
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), w0)
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), w0)

comment: A double specialization (see ~ sp ). Another double specialization, closer to PM*11.1, is ~ 2stdpc4 . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Sep-2018.)
